searchBy$

    startWith(''),

    switchMap((obs) => obs),
    shareReplay(1)

components.name: CustomTemplatesComponent

propertiesClass.name: data

components.name: GtDeltaComponent
components.template:
<span    *ngIf="{
      value:
        index === 0
          ? initialValue
          : ((baseIndex === undefined
              ? data[index - 1][key]
              : data[baseIndex][key]) -
              data[index][key]) /
            -Math.abs(
              baseIndex === undefined
                ? data[index - 1][key]
                : data[baseIndex][key]
            )
    } as delta"
    [class]="[
      classes.span,
      !delta.value || !Number.isFinite(delta.value)
        ? null
        : delta.value > 0
        ? classes.positive
        : classes.negative
    ]"
    [class.gt-delta-positive]="delta.value > 0 && Number.isFinite(delta.value)"
    [class.gt-delta-negative]="delta.value < 0"
    >{{
      Number.isFinite(delta.value)
        ? (delta.value | percent)
        : delta.value === initialValue
        ? initialValue
        : notApplicableValue
    }}</span
  >

inputsClass.name: classes
inputsClass.type: { span: string; positive: string; negative: string; }
